data.title: Dermatomes and Myotomal Maps
data.content:
# Dermatomes and Myotomal Maps ![](https://d2p53dh3qxfm0x.cloudfront.net/uploads/img/1jx/5/m/9a8510e6-307b-50b6-b589-347c2d2081a7/640.png) **Testing Motor Function by Level**
C1-C4 Spontaneous breathing
C5 Shoulder abduction (deltoid)
C6 Wrist extension (carpi radialis longus and brevis)
C7 Elbow extension (triceps)
C8 Finger flexion (flexor digitorum superficialis/profundus, lumbricals)
T1 Finger ADduction & ABduction (dorsal/palmar interossei, abductor digiti quinti)
T1-T12 Intercostal and abdominal muscle
T12-L3 Hip flexion (iliopsoas)
L2-L4 Hip flexion, knee extension (quadriceps),Â hip adduction
L4 Ankle dorsiflexion and inversion (anterior tibialis)
L5
  • Big toe extension
  • Heel walk
  • Hip abduction
S1
  • Ankle plantarflexion and eversion
  • Toe walk
  • Hip extension
S2-S4 Rectal sphincter tone
